channel.title: Apples "Multitouch" Lawsuit against Motorola! Goodbye droids!
channel.description:
http://www.conceivablytech.com/3810/business/apple-slams-motorola-with-multitouch-lawsuit/
What do you guys think of this matter? And what do you think will be the outcome?

item.title: Apples "Multitouch" Lawsuit against Motorola! Goodbye droids!
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Apple are getting pissed that they are losing sales. Having next-gen android & windows phones has created great completion for them, this is just another way for them to rinse the market out of as much money as possible before it goes ‘dry’.

I have already decided my upgrade is going to be an android phone, been playing with the simulator on my PC and already hooked!

Read full topic
item.source: Apples "Multitouch" Lawsuit against Motorola! Goodbye droids!

item.title: Apples "Multitouch" Lawsuit against Motorola! Goodbye droids!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Apple sued HTC over this first, does anyone know how that one was resolved?

Also, this is akin to Douglas Engelbart suing Apple, Microsoft, Dell, Logitech and everyone else who ever made a mouse for using his invention without paying him royalties. Everyone would think that was stupid, and this lawsuit is just as stupid.

edit:
According to this article, Motorola sued Apple first, to invalidate those bogus patents:

Engadget

Motorola asks court to invalidate Apple patents, preempt another lawsuit

The smartphone intellectual property wars are seriously heating up, as Motorola sided with HTC this week in an effort to cover its own rear. Remember those twe...

Hmm.

Read full topic
item.source: Apples "Multitouch" Lawsuit against Motorola! Goodbye droids!

item.title: Apples "Multitouch" Lawsuit against Motorola! Goodbye droids!
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:3, topic:370913”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=467004.msg3414920#msg3414920 date=1290973770]
Nothing will happen at all. Everyone is attacking everyone with cases that’ll go nowhere.
[/quote]But apple has some good points and rights here, this could actually go somewhere.[/quote]http://www.engadget.com/search/?q=apple+motorola&invocationType=wl-gadget

Read full topic

Too bad the patents are fucking stupid and if the american courts weren’t so retarded the case would probably get thrown out and the patents revoked.
